text: The new AI curriculum is very comprehensive and exciting.
We need more quiet zones in the library during exam weeks.
The laundry service in Hostel A is always on time.
The swimming pool water is not clean enough.
Mock interviews were incredibly helpful for my actual interview.
The hygiene in the canteen could be improved during lunch hours.
Math professors are taking extra classes which is very helpful.
The elevators in the main block are often under maintenance.
Vending machines in Hostel B are out of stock most of the time.
The indoor gym equipment is state-of-the-art.
Need more industrial visit opportunities for civil engineering.
The evening snacks are too oily; please provide healthier options.
The library staff is very supportive in finding research papers.
Floodlights for the football ground are frequently flickering.
Hot water supply in the mornings is inconsistent.
The table tennis boards need replacement.
Coding bootcamps helped me secure a job at a top tech firm.
The coffee at the canteen is the best part of my morning!
The lab equipment for physics is outdated.
Air conditioning in the reading room is too cold.
The common room is a great place to socialize.
Cricket practice nets are always occupied; need more nets.
Resume building workshops were slightly repetitive.
Prices for lunch meals are very affordable for students.
The guest lectures from industry experts were inspiring.
Bathroom light sensors are not working.
Security guards are very professional and helpful.
The yoga sessions in the morning are highly refreshing.
Soft skills training should be made mandatory for all years.
Wait times for ordering food are too long during peak hours.
